abstract: To lead its legal charge against Facebook, Yahoo has picked the law firm Quinn Emanuel, a litigation shop that has tussled with the social-networking giant before — on behalf of the Winklevoss twins.
snippet: To lead its legal charge against Facebook, Yahoo has picked the law firm Quinn Emanuel, a litigation shop that has tussled with the social-networking giant before — on behalf of the Winklevoss twins.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo‘s lawsuit against Facebook on Monday over allegations of patent infringement offered interesting nuggets of information, including the 10 technologies in question.

headline.main: Facebook Confronts a Familiar Opponent in Fight With Yahoo

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
